description: Detects disabling Windows Defender threat protection Author: Ján Trenčanský, frack113, AlertIQ. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Windows Defender Threat Detection Disabled
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000001\)" AND (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:("HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\DisableAntiSpyware" OR "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\DisableAntiVirus") OR winlog.event_data.TargetObject:("HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\WinDefend" OR "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender" OR "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender")))
